document_data.name: Sangin
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sangin''' was a [[human]] [[warlock]] who lived in [[Barovia]] during the 15{{th}} century of the [[DR|Faer√ªnian calendar]].{{Cite comic/Shadows of the Vampire 1}}

{{Quote|This is our prison, the realm of our master...|Sangin.}}
document_data.Description: The warlock wore simple [[robe]]s of earthen hues but adorned himself with numerous rings. He wore particularly tiny glasses ad the end of his rather large nose.
document_data.Personality: He was a conniving man that cared primarily for his own wellbeing. He desperately sought a way to escape Barovia, seeing others as merely a means to that end.
document_data.Abilities: Sangin was at least somewhat knowledgeable about the workings of the [[arcane]].
document_data.Relationships:
Like all inhabitants of Barovia were in some way, Sangin was a servant of Count [[Strahd von Zarovich]].

Sangin briefly worked with a pair of [[werewolves]] [[Dron]] and [[Utna]], who laired with their pack in a cave network near [[Lake Baratok]].
